name: Ceremonial Disengagement
description: Ritualistic practices to sever emotional, spiritual, and mental bonds with toxic individuals and influences.

cards.title: The Severance Ritual
cards.description: Performing a structured ritual to cut psychic and emotional ties to harmful relationships.
bulletpoints: Use symbolic objects to represent and sever the unwanted connection.
Perform energy release visualizations to dissolve lingering attachments.
Engage in grounding techniques to stabilize your energetic field post-severance.
cards.summaryText: Work the severance ritual with symbols, visualize the release, and ground hard once the ties are cut.

cards.title: The Mirror Reflection Technique
cards.description: Using mirrored energy projection to neutralize emotional and psychic attachments.
bulletpoints: Visualize a reflective barrier bouncing negative energy away from your field.
Apply emotional transmutation to shift pain into neutrality or empowerment.
Integrate psychic shielding practices to prevent future energetic imprints.
cards.summaryText: Raise the mirror, transmute the emotion, and lock in shields so fresh imprints canâ€™t latch on.

cards.title: Rewriting the Soul Contract
cards.description: Revoking subconscious agreements that keep toxic patterns in place.
bulletpoints: Identify personal narratives that bind you to unwanted emotional cycles.
Use affirmation-based deprogramming to overwrite limiting beliefs.
Perform a symbolic ritual of rebirth to solidify a new empowered path.
cards.summaryText: Name the old soul contract, rewrite it with focused affirmations, and seal it with a rebirth ritual.

cards.title: Fire Cleansing Ceremony
cards.description: Using fire as a symbolic and energetic purifier to dissolve emotional entanglements.
bulletpoints: Write down toxic connections and burn them as a release ritual.
Visualize past emotional weight turning to ash and clearing from your field.
Reaffirm your sovereignty through fire-based intention setting.
cards.summaryText: Let fire consume the written ties, watch the weight turn to ash, and restate your sovereignty.

cards.title: Water Purification Release
cards.description: Harnessing the transformative nature of water to dissolve psychic bonds.
bulletpoints: Use salt baths or running water rituals to cleanse energetic imprints.
Set a mental intention to flush out lingering emotional toxins.
Pair with breathwork to synchronize physical and energetic purification.
cards.summaryText: Immerse in salt or flowing water, breathe intention through it, and rinse the bonds away.

cards.title: Symbolic Object Burial
cards.description: Burying physical items linked to toxic connections to sever attachments.
bulletpoints: Choose an object that holds the energy of the past relationship.
Perform a burial ceremony with an intention of closure and release.
Visualize the object absorbing and containing the last remnants of attachment.
cards.summaryText: Charge an object with the old energy, bury it with closure, and let it contain the final remnants.

cards.title: Energetic Signature Reset
cards.description: Resetting and realigning your energetic identity to eliminate unwanted influences.
bulletpoints: Perform energy sweeping techniques to clear residual connections.
Use breath control to regulate and stabilize personal vibrational output.
Anchor a new identity imprint that reflects your highest self.
cards.summaryText: Sweep your field clean, steady the breath, and install a fresh energetic signature aligned with your highest self.

cards.title: Releasing Through Sound Vibration
cards.description: Using vocalization, chanting, or frequency tuning to break energetic bonds.
bulletpoints: Engage in chanting or toning to dissolve energetic stagnation.
Use sound frequencies like tuning forks or singing bowls to realign vibrations.
Project voice-based affirmations to reinforce the release process.
cards.summaryText: Break the bonds with chant, tone, and sound, then seal it by speaking your release into the field.

cards.title: Shadow Work Severance
cards.description: Deep subconscious detachment by integrating and releasing past wounds.
bulletpoints: Engage in mirror work to confront unresolved emotional wounds.
Use journal-based self-inquiry to identify lingering subconscious ties.
Perform a symbolic act of self-forgiveness and emotional liberation.
cards.summaryText: Face the shadow in the mirror, write the truths out, and free yourself with a forgiveness ritual.

cards.title: Sacred Space Sanctification
cards.description: Cleansing and reclaiming personal spaces to remove energetic remnants of past connections.
bulletpoints: Use smoke clearing, sacred herbs, or incense to remove stagnant energy.
Set clear boundaries and intentions for maintaining a sovereign space.
Program objects and furniture with protective sigils or affirmations.
cards.summaryText: Smoke cleanse the space, state fresh boundaries, and program every object to hold your sovereignty.
